$schema.description: The explicit schema set. It is optional, as GherKing is supported by schemastore.org, thus most IDE.

source.description: The source folder or glob pattern of the input feature files.

base.description: The base folder of the input feature files.

destination.description: The destination folder to put the output feature files.

compilers.description: The precompilers to use and their configuration.

gpcCustom.title: custom precompiler
gpcCustom.description: A custom precompiler configuration, implemented either as an object or a PreCompiler class.

path.description: Either the NPM package name to use, or the path to a JS file containing a PreCompiler.

configuration.description: The configuration object, if necessary, to be passed to the custom precompiler class.

gpcReplacer.title: gpc-replacer
gpcReplacer.description: This GherKing Precompiler is responsible to replace keys in feature files with given values.

configuration.description: The key-value pairs to replace in the feature files.

gpcFilter.title: gpc-filter
gpcFilter.description: The Filter precompiler is responsible for including or excluding the elements of a feature file in the result, which match a cucumber-tag-expression (e.g., has a given tag, does not have a given tag).

configuration.description: Cucumber-tag-expression the filtering is based on
configuration.$comment: The pattern must contain at least one cucumber tag.

gpcForLoop.title: gpc-for-loop
gpcForLoop.description: A precompiler of GherKing to loop scenarios and scenario outlines to repeat them.

tagName.description: Tag used to mark scenarios or outlines to be repeated.

format.description: Format of the scenario or outline name after repeating. These tokens must be used: ${name}, ${i}.

limitToMaxValue.description: Whether higher iteration values than the max should be limited to the max or error should be thrown (false).

gpcMacro.title: gpc-macro
gpcMacro.description: This precompiler is responsible for defining macros in feature files and then executing them.

gpcRemoveComments.title: gpc-remove-comments
gpcRemoveComments.description: This precompiler removes all or particular type of semantic comments from the feature file.

keep.description: To set which comment types should be kept, not removed.

gpcRemoveDuplicates.title: gpc-remove-duplicates
gpcRemoveDuplicates.description: The RemoveDuplicates precompiler is responsible for having only a reasonable amount of tags and/or rows in each feature file.

processTags.description: Should tags on the same level and from parent be de-duplicated.

gpcScenarioNumbering.title: gpc-scenario-numbering
gpcScenarioNumbering.description: The ScenarioNumbering precompiler is responsible for adding an index to all scenarios and scenario outlines.

format.description: The format, how index should be added to the name of the scenario/scenairo outline. Possible tokens: ${name} the original name, ${i} the index

gpcScenarioOutlineExpander.title: gpc-scenario-outline-expander
gpcScenarioOutlineExpander.description: This precompiler is responsible for converting Scenario Outlines to single Scenarios as Cucumber would do and adds the first column as a tag.

ignoreTag.description: Tag used to mark scenarios to be ignored during expanding Scenario Outlines.

gpcScenarioOutlineNumbering.title: gpc-scenario-outline-numbering
gpcScenarioOutlineNumbering.description: This precompiler can add numbering column to Examples tables, and apply formatting to the name of the Scenario Outline.

addParameters.description: Should the example parameters be added to the name of the Scenario Outline.

parameterDelimiter.description: The delimiter to use when adding the parameters to the name of the Scenario Outline.

parameterFormat.description: The format how the output Scenario Outline name should look with the parameters. Tokens to use: ${name}, ${parameters}

addNumbering.description: Should an index be added to the name of the Scenario Outline.

numberingFormat.description: The format how the output Scenario Outline name should look with the index. Tokens to use: ${name}, ${i}

strictNaming.description: Should the existing numbering field (num) block execution (true) or be used for numbering (false).

gpcStepGroups.title: gpc-step-groups
gpcStepGroups.description: The StepGroups precompiler is responsible for correcting the gherkin keywords of steps to make the tests more readable.

gpcTestData.title: gpc-test-data
gpcTestData.description: This precompiler can load external data (JSON, CSV, or XLS/XLSX) into exmaples table.

keepTag.description: Whether the load-tags should be kept or removed.

defaultValue.description: The default value to be added to the table if a column/value is not found.

appendData.description: Whether the loaded data should be appended to the existing rows of the examples table or overwritten.

ignoreKeyCase.description: Whether the casing of the example columns and data columns should be ignored.

gpcLicense.title: gpc-license
gpcLicense.description: This precompiler can be used to inject License statement into the feature files.

licenseFile.description: The file's path where the license is stored.

licenseText.description: The exact license text. It can contain the ${LICENSE} token to set the content of the license file.

placement.description: The place to inject the license text, either in start or end comment.

configuration.$comment: Either licenseFile or licenseText must be set!

formatOptions.description: Options to pass to gherkin-formatter, on how to format the output feature files.

oneTagPerLine.description: Should the tags be rendered separately, one by line?

compact.description: Should empty lines be skipped, removed from the result?
